channel.title: Lunar magic help. [pi]
channel.description: On my server, whenever someone clicks on a guthix altar (to change to lunar magics) it causes their spellbook to switch to a blank book, then if they re log it shows the lunar spellbook, where/what/how can i fix this :S

item.title: Lunar magic help. [pi]

On my server, whenever someone clicks on a guthix altar (to change to lunar magics) it causes their spellbook to switch to a blank book, then if they re log it shows the lunar spellbook, where/what/how can i fix this :S
